Get LD using snpStats package

Source: R/LD.R
LD.snpstats_get_LD.Rd

Get LD using snpStats package

LD.snpstats_get_LD(
  LD_folder,
  plink_prefix = "plink",
  select.snps = NULL,
  stats = c("R"),
  symmetric = T,
  depth = "max",
  nThread = 4,
  verbose = T
)

Arguments

LD_folder

Locus-specific LD output folder.
stats

A character vector specifying the linkage disequilibrium measures to be calculated. This should contain one or more of the strings: "LLR", "OR", "Q", "Covar", "D.prime", "R.squared", ad "R"
symmetric

When no y argument is supplied this argument controls the format of the output band matrices. If TRUE, symmetric matrices are returned and, otherwise, an upper triangular matrices are returned
depth

When y is not supplied, this parameter is mandatory and controls the maximum lag between columns of x considered. Thus, LD statistics are calculated between x[,i] and x[,j] only if i and j differ by no more than depth

Source

snpStats Bioconductor page LD tutorial

See also

Other LD: LD.1KG_download_vcf(), LD.1KG(), LD.LD_blocks(), LD.UKBiobank(), LD.calculate_LD(), LD.construct_subset_vcf_name(), LD.custom_panel(), LD.dprime_table(), LD.filter_LD(), LD.filter_vcf_gaston(), LD.filter_vcf(), LD.get_locus_vcf_folder(), LD.index_vcf(), LD.leadSNP_block(), LD.load_or_create(), LD.plink_LD(), LD.plink_file(), LD.plot_LD(), LD.query_vcf(), LD.rds_to_npz(), LD.read_bin(), LD.read_ld_table(), LD.run_plink_LD(), LD.save_LD_matrix(), LD.snpstats_get_MAF(), LD.translate_population(), LD.vcf_to_bed(), LDlinkR.LDproxy_batch(), popDat_1KGphase1, popDat_1KGphase3, saveSparse()

Examples

subset_DT <- data.table::fread("/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ABCA7/Multi-finemap/ABCA7.Kunkle_2019.1KGphase3_LD.Multi-finemap.tsv.gz")

#> Error in data.table::fread("/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ABCA7/Multi-finemap/ABCA7.Kunkle_2019.1KGphase3_LD.Multi-finemap.tsv.gz"): File '/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ABCA7/Multi-finemap/ABCA7.Kunkle_2019.1KGphase3_LD.Multi-finemap.tsv.gz' does not exist or is non-readable. getwd()=='/Users/schilder/Desktop/echolocatoR/docs/reference'
LD_folder <- "/pd-omics/brian/Fine_Mapping/Data/GWAS/Kunkle_2019/ABCA7/LD"
LD_matrix <- LD.snpstats_get_LD(LD_folder=LD_folder, select.snps=subset_DT$SNP)

#> [1] "LD:snpStats:: Computing LD (stats = R)"
#> Error in LD.snpstats_ensure_nonduplicates(select.snps = select.snps, LD_folder = LD_folder,     plink_prefix = plink_prefix, nThread = nThread, verbose = verbose): object 'subset_DT' not found
